Subskills.name: Strenghtened Veil
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by slice of shadows based on your strength.

Subskills.name: Shadow Extraction
Subskills.description: Perform an empowered attack unleashing small shadows from the target on hit.

Subskills.name: Shadow Duality
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash an additional slice of shadows on attack.

Subskills.name: Mist of Darkness
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using slice of shadows.

Subskills.name: Stacking Shadow
Subskills.description: Gain a stacking damage buff for a short period on hit.

Subskills.name: Crushing Veil
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict armor break on hit.

Subskills.name: Cold Shadow
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to freeze enemies.

Subskills.name: Scorching Shadow
Subskills.description: Unleash a shadow ball of fire bouncing from terrain and inflicting burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Frostbitten Mist
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to frozen targets.

Subskills.name: Bitter Smoke
Subskills.description: Increases critical strike damage when using slice of shadows.

Subskills.name: Looming Mist
Subskills.description: Increases the size of slice of shadows.

Subskills.name: Shadow's Arc
Subskills.description: Unleash additional shadows in an arc.

Subskills.name: Lingering Shadows
Subskills.description: Gain stacks of lingering shadows on hit. At maximum stacks your next slice of shadows deals increased damage with increased size.
